ygData.subject: Re: Source for Combine Weapons
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I do not think the Dragoon Dirks will devalue as much as the mino axes did, since they are lore items you can not lug 20 of em to Qeynos to sell :) Also I
ygData.messageBody:
>From: "Jones, Brian" <brian.jones@...>
>Reply-To: eqbards@onelist.com
>To: eqbards@onelist.com
>Subject: Re: [eqbards] Source for Combine Weapons
>Date: Thu, 1 Jul 1999 07:08:18 -0500
>
>From: "Jones, Brian" <brian.jones@...>
>
>The thing I like about combines better than the other weapons is the resale
>value. You purchase a Dragoon Dirk now for 40 plat, in a couple of months
>when you get tired of it you won't get much of a return because of players
>getting them and flooding the market. This has already happened with Mino
>Axes - they used to sell for over 10pp a piece when I first started. Now
>you can get them for 3 - 4pp. Combines you can always sell back for about
>a
>20% loss, and can sell to another player for a little less than what you
>paid for it.
>

I do not think the Dragoon Dirks will devalue as much as the mino axes did,
since they are lore items you can not lug 20 of em to Qeynos to sell :)
Also I have always resold my combine weapons on Feydwer and for MORE then I
bought them. When people have whined about it I would point out that I am
saving them at least two hours of time round trip, plus they do not have to
journey through very hostile territory (esp for combine blunt and piercing
weapons).

Rokenn Swiftsong - Karana server
Master Brewer of Societus Argenti
Amerginn - Test server
